column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////My favorite here is probably the kugelhopf. Fruit tarts are pretty good
column2: and the scone is all right. They also serve brunch
column3: which I haven't had a chance to try but looks pretty good from what I've seen. Coffee is good
column4: but you can easily find several places with good coffee in Montrose without coming here for just that.
